html: 3.8.17  9:44 pm   for your other short-form videos, did you usually write scripts or notes about graphics and the like?

3.8.17  6:51 pm   how do you feel about adding titles to your songs when you eventually make a video? for example, the song "hide from strangers" has a totally different meaning than "being a human, explained". another example would be "just try to have a good time" having its meaning changed when you made a video and changed the title to "homework help". I hope this question makes sense.

3.8.17  8:46 am   so I've been only aware of your youtube content for a while and it seems like you don't talk about yourself or your video making process on there. I'm not trying to scream into the pit of "work harder because you died billiam" but I want to know why you prefer the smaller community of your website compared to the larger one on youtube

3.8.17  8:37 am   bill how do i stop my heart from beating so hard? my heart beats so hard because i'm so excited about finishing my project, and i can't go to sleep at night. it's really throwing me off. i thought you might have experience with something like this and was wondering what you did to calm down
